programme.title: The Hunted
programme.desc: The FBI's tracker is on the trail of a villain who murders people in order to become the subject of a manhunt.

programme.title: First Blood
programme.desc: A veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains.

programme.desc: John Rambo is sent on assignment back to Southeast Asia to uncover evidence of still missing POWs.

programme.title: Rambo III
programme.desc: Rambo refuses to join a mission. Trautma is captured. Rambo infiltrates the fortress to save his friend.

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
programme.desc: DiCaprio stars as a young stockbroker hungry for a life of non-stop thrills, where corruption was king.

programme.title: Braveheart
programme.desc: William Wallace, a commoner, unites the 13th Century Scots in their battle to overthrow English rule.

programme.title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit
programme.desc: Jack Ryan must evolve from soldier to analyst to operative to stop a terrorist plot against the United States.

programme.title: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: A young Irish immigrant (Leonardo DiCaprio) seeks revenge against the rival gang leader who killed his father.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers
programme.desc: The first major battle of the American phase of the Vietnam War and the soldiers on both sides that fought.
